text: We're excited to partner with @openai to bring day-1 support for their open models to @aisdk and AI Gateway.
fullText: We're excited to partner with @openai to bring day-1 support for their open models to @aisdk and AI Gateway.

author.name: Vercel
author.description: Vercel provides the developer tools and cloud infrastructure to build, scale, and secure a faster, more personalized web. Creators of @nextjs, @v0, and @aisdk.

quote.text:
You can now access @openai's new open models through Vercel AI Gateway.

Set the AI SDK v5 ùöñùöòùöçùöéùöï to either 'openai/gpt-oss-20b' or 'openai/gpt-oss-120b' to start building.

Multiple redundant inference providers. No accounts required.
https://t.co/XTv69O6vS5

author.name: Vercel Changelog
author.description: New features, improvements, and products from @vercel.

value.string_value: You can now access gpt-oss by OpenAI, an open-weight reasoning model designed to push the open model frontier, using Vercel's AI Gateway with no other provider accounts required.
gpt-oss-20b and gpt-oss-120b are now supported in Vercel AI Gateway - Vercel

text:
Bot Protection challenged over 650 million suspected non-browser requests during beta.

It's now generally available to all users.
